source.query:
<fetch>
	<entity name="stringmap">

	<attribute name="attributename"/>
	<attribute name="attributevalue"/>
	<attribute name="objecttypecode"/>
	<attribute name="value"/>

	<filter type="and">
      <filter type="or">
        <condition attribute="attributename" operator="like" value="phg_%"/>

        <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="accountcategorycode" />
        <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="address1_addresstypecode" />
        <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="customertypecode" />

        <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="familystatuscode" />
        <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="preferredcontactmethodcode" />

      </filter>
    </filter>

</entity>
</fetch>
